Estimated time: 30min. 
 * Remove the pulp from the two boiled potatoes, leaving a cavity in each one, set aside. 
 * In a container, mix the potato pulp with salt, pepper, egg, mozzarella cheese, fried bacon and cream, mix well. 
 * On a board, place the two potatoes and distribute a little mozzarella cheese in each cavity, the mixture of pulps, fried bacon, a little more mozzarella cheese on top, bacon and finish with chopped chives to taste. 
 * Place in the oven (230Â°C) for about 20 minutes.
